No, he is part of a religion called Thelema, which is often confused with Satanism. Thelemites believe your purpose in life is to find your true Will. The Book of Law, written by Aleister Crowley states “Love is the law, love under will” and “Do what thou wilt shall be the whole of the Law.” Ghostemane references these phrases and Thelemic texts frequently in his songs, also while making fun of how the religion is commonly associated with Satanism.
